ISSUE.TITLE: Unable to create a service from a template
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Deployment Type Self-hosted ### NetBox Version v4.2.8 ### Python Version 3.10 ### Steps to Reproduce 1. Create a device with at least one interface. 2. Assign an IP address to an interface on the device. 3. Create a service template for e.g. TCP/443. 4. Click "add a service" under the device view. This will present the service creation form with the current device already selected. 5. Select the service template and IP address, then click "create." ### Expected Behavior The service should be created. ### Observed Behavior No action is taken. The form does not appear to be submitted.

COMMIT.MESSAGE: Fixes #19281: Fix service template creation form
Merge pull request #19282 from netbox-community/19281-fix-service-templates Fixes #19281: Fix service template creation form
